Knot1: ^Hey baby. Let me admit to you right off that bat that I'm in jail, but I swear I have never hurt a woman and never would.
^What are you in jail for then?
Knot2: ^Women never give convicts a second chance, I'm just trying to get my life back together. I want a relationship and a family so I can put my past behind me.
^So why did you say all that stuff about not hurting women?
Knot3: ^So would you be able to come visit me in jail? A buddy of mine used to being me... certain things, but he's not allowed to visit any more. If I write you a list of items can you bring me them?
^You want me to fence contraband for you? That's highly illegal.
Knot4: ^I knew you wouldn't understand. You better not be an undercover cop or I'll find where you live and break everything you own. Including pets. And relatives. And you.
Knot5: ^I'm going to need a plastic sharpener, a file, half a gram of black tar heroin, 20 packs of JPS silvers, a pack on condoms, a kilo of potatoes, and a pair of rubber gloves.
Knot6: ^I just wanted to know I never hurt a woman. I shot a guy dead, but he had it coming, he messed with the wrong gang.
^I'm done here, I can't date a guy who's shot someone
Knot7: ^Yeah and I'd do it again for my brothers. We ride together, we die together!
^Ok you have fun with that, I'm gonna head out
Knot8: ^So I may have low-key shot a guy to death, but he had it coming, he messed with the wrong gang.
^I'm done here, I can't date a guy who's shot someone
